IndexArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 1600  

Pattern: ^arn(:[a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*){2}(:([a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*)?){2}:([^/].*)?$
